actions.name: bot_mention
actions.description: Triggers when a user mentions the bot in a message.

actions.name: list_guilds
actions.description: Retrieves the list of Discord servers linked to your account.

actions.name: member_join
actions.description: Triggers when a member joins the specified Discord server.

actions.name: member_remove
actions.description: Triggers when a member leaves the specified Discord server.

actions.name: member_update
actions.description: Triggers when a member changes their nickname in the specified Discord server.

reactions.name: send_channel_message
reactions.description: Sends a message to the specified Discord channel using the connected bot.

actions.name: get_player_id
actions.description: Retrieves the unique FACEIT player ID associated with the provided nickname.

actions.name: match_finished
actions.description: Triggers when the specified FACEIT player finishes a match.

actions.name: retrieve_player_ranking
actions.description: Récupère la position actuelle d'un joueur FACEIT en se basant sur son pseudo.

actions.name: retrieve_player_stats
actions.description: Fetches statistics for the player's most recent FACEIT match.

actions.name: recent_emails_from_sender
actions.description: Returns up to N recent emails received from the specified sender.

reactions.name: create_calendar_event
reactions.description: Creates a Google Calendar event starting immediately and lasting one hour.

reactions.name: send_mail
reactions.description: Sends an email using the Gmail API.

reactions.name: play_playlist
reactions.description: Plays the specified playlist on the user's active Spotify device.

reactions.name: play_track
reactions.description: Plays the specified track on the user's active Spotify device.

actions.name: interval
actions.description: Triggers the workflow periodically after the specified number of minutes.

actions.name: channel.follow
actions.description: Triggers when someone follows the channel.

actions.name: channel.subscribe
actions.description: Triggers when someone subscribes to the channel.

actions.name: stream.online
actions.description: Triggers when a Twitch stream goes live.

reactions.name: tweet
reactions.description: Posts a tweet with the given text.
